Question
========
In Positron, what happens when you click the Preview button for a Quarto file?

Answerlist
----------
* It only checks YAML syntax
* It opens a blank document tab
* It runs `quarto preview` and shows the rendered output
* It deletes temporary files in the project

Solution
========
Preview runs Quarto's preview command and opens the rendered document.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
